page.title: 14An interesting resident.(1)
page.content: One isolated cottage has been occupied by a lady who decided,fifty years ago, to avoid 'the rat race'.She came originally from Ireland, her father working for a local forestry estate. She decided to stay on in the area after her father died and spent a lot of time visiting old people dying of cancer .The declining rural community had left a lot of elderly living in poor conditions and cancer seemed to be particularly prevalent.She worked at a chemists in Stroud and walked there and back every day. {She has a wonderful house.The front {room is most unusual with a lot of {mirrors,old china,wooden carvings and {animal pictures.The chairs are covered {in a mix of blankets and cushions-and {the whole place smells of animals {because of all her pets. {Gemma Owen.} cont.on p.15
